ActDepartment of Human Resources and Skills Development Act
PrecisAppointment of ADRIANO PERSI of Hamilton, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal for the Income Security Section, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective February 1, 2014.
